title: Remove live version label from footer

requirements.summary: Remove the “Draft 34” live version label from the footer while keeping all other footer content and layout unchanged, including removing the adjacent separator.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer displays the text “Draft 34” anywhere.
All other footer elements remain visible and unchanged (© line, heart icon, “using”, and caffeine.ai link).
No extra separator (e.g., the “•” bullet) is shown if the version label is not rendered.

file_operations.description: Update the footer JSX to stop rendering the LIVE_VERSION value and remove the adjacent separator so the footer content and spacing remain otherwise unchanged.
